docs.snippet: Turin city council has approved Juventus's plan for a new multi-million dollar training complex to be built next to their new ground, the ANSA news agency reported on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turin city council has approved Juventus's plan for a new multi-million dollar training complex to be built next to their new ground, the ANSA news agency reported on Friday.

headline.main: Juve's Multi-Million Dollar Training Complex Is Approved

docs.snippet: Ex-National Football League player Aaron Hernandez pleaded not guilty on Friday to murder in connection with the June killing of semi-pro football player Odin Lloyd, and his lawyer said that not "one shred" of damning evidence had yet been present...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ex-National Football League player Aaron Hernandez pleaded not guilty on Friday to murder in connection with the June killing of semi-pro football player Odin Lloyd, and his lawyer said that not "one shred" of damning evidence had yet been presented.

headline.main: Ex-NFL Star Hernandez Pleads Not Guilty to Murder

docs.snippet: The questions surrounding Peyton Manning last year were all about his right arm. This season, they were about his shoulders — as in, are they broad enough to carry the Denver Broncos in Von Miller's absence?...

headline.main: Manning Puts Broncos on His Broad Shoulders

docs.snippet: A disappointed Li Na admitted to an attack of stage fright in her humbling U.S. Open semi-final loss to Serena Williams and said she would have lost to any opponent she faced on Friday....

docs.snippet: A diving header from Abdul Majeed Waris and a thumping long range effort from Kwadwo Asamoah ensured a 2-1 win for Ghana over Zambia in their World Cup qualifier in Kumasi on Friday and top place in Group D....
docs.lead_paragraph: A diving header from Abdul Majeed Waris and a thumping long range effort from Kwadwo Asamoah ensured a 2-1 win for Ghana over Zambia in their World Cup qualifier in Kumasi on Friday and top place in Group D.

docs.snippet: Fans of popular artists or sports teams are painfully aware how difficult it is to find good seats to live events at affordable prices. With a new ticket resale system, Ticketmaster is trying to show you what seats are available in one place &#821...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans of popular artists or sports teams are painfully aware how difficult it is to find good seats to live events at affordable prices. With a new ticket resale system, Ticketmaster is trying to show you what seats are available in one place — both unsold ones and those up for resale — so you can price-shop more easily.

headline.main: Ticketmaster Puts Resale, Unsold Tickets in 1 Spot
headline.print_headline: Ticketmaster Puts Resale, Unsold Tickets in 1 Spot

docs.snippet: After years of Republican obstruction and obfuscation, supporters of the law are fighting back to raise enrollment....
docs.lead_paragraph: After years of Republican obstruction and obfuscation, supporters of the law are fighting back to raise enrollment.
docs.abstract: Editorial cites new Kaiser Family Foundation poll finding that more than half of Americans say they do not know how health care reform law will affect their families; holds findings show the impact Republican obstruction and obfuscation have had on perceptions of the law; welcomes  Obama administration's public relations effort to highlight law's benefits and encourage enrollment in health insurance plans.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
